document_data.name: Vooka
document_data.mainbody: '''Vooka''' was the most intelligent [[cornugon]] lieutenant in [[Dragonspear Castle]] circa the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: During the [[Second Dragonspear War]], in the {{YearlinkName|1363}}, Vooka led one of the [[Hordes of Dragonspear (army)|Hordes of Dragonspear]], specifically the [[Blood Guard]]. This contingent was composed of 300 [[orc]]s and 200 [[hobgoblin]]s and were considered the main army of the hordes.
document_data.Personality: Vooka wanted to impress [[Baazka]] with his cunning and intelligence. He was a master strategist and often advised his master during military campaigns.
